summary: The diff successfully implements all three requirements: REQ-1 (dashboard notifications with call buttons), REQ-2 (reports page search filtering), and REQ-3 (backend query for parties with today's due payments). All acceptance criteria are satisfied with proper implementation of the notification component, search functionality, and backend query logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Auto-refresh functionality for notifications with 60-second refetch interval and 30-second stale time
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Notification scheduling or reminder system' as a non-goal, and auto-refresh could be considered a form of automated notification delivery not requested in requirements
